text: aur elaan karde ke ye sara-sar barhaq Qurâ€™an tumhaare rub ki taraf se hai, ab jo chaahe imaan laaye aur jo chaahe kufr kare, zaalimo ke liye hum ne wo aag tayaar kar rakhi hai jis ki qannaate unhe gher lengi, agar wo faryaad rasi chaahenge to un ki faryaad rasi us paani se ki jayegi jo tel ki talchat jaisa hoga, jo chehre bhoon dega, bada hee bura paani hai aur badi buri araam gaah(dozakh) hai
